name: AddNewEcommerceStore
description:
Add a new e-commerce store to your Mailchimp account.

Use this tool to add a new store to your Mailchimp account for managing e-commerce activities. Call this tool when you need to integrate a new store with Mailchimp.

parameters.name: ecommerce_store_details
parameters.description: A JSON object with details about the e-commerce store like id, platform, domain, etc.

id.description: The unique identifier for the store.

list_id.description: The unique identifier for the list associated with the store. The `list_id` for a specific store cannot change.

platform.description: The e-commerce platform of the store.

domain.description: The store domain. This parameter is required for Connected Sites and Google Ads.

is_syncing.description: Whether to disable automations because the store is currently [syncing](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#pausing-store-automations).

email_address.description: The email address for the store.

currency_code.description: The three-letter ISO 4217 code for the currency that the store accepts.

money_format.description: The currency format for the store. For example: `$`, `£`, etc.

primary_locale.description: The primary locale for the store. For example: `en`, `de`, etc.

address2.description: An additional field for the store's mailing address.

city.description: The city the store is located in.

province.description: The store's state name or normalized province.

province_code.description: The two-letter code for the store's province or state.

postal_code.description: The store's postal or zip code.

country_code.description: The two-letter code for to the store's country.

longitude.description: The longitude of the store location.

latitude.description: The latitude of the store location.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.
